attributes.action: make sure that our front line troops are fed properly however difficult it might be !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is a well known fact that our troops are being very badly fed whilst on front line duty while other countries are getting treated like royalty i urge the prime minister and the defence minister to act on this as a matter of urgency as these men are putting there lives on the line on a daily basis while they are absolutely starving !
